channel.title: Good HL 2 mods
channel.description:
Hey. I've just read a thread about Radiator mod. So I ask you guys - what are some good mods like Radiator, that aren't "another multiplayer fps".
EDIT: You guys inspired me. I'm buying Orange Box immidiatly. I didn't know it's that cheap... But my question is still valid.

item.title: Good HL 2 mods
item.dc:creator: DeleteThis
item.description:
How has no one mentioned Zombie Panic: Source?
It’s a fun game if you can tolerate the average amount of bs you get when you play these type of games

Read full topic

item.title: Good HL 2 mods
item.dc:creator: ar487
item.description:
^ Sory didn’t read

EDIT: Here’s some more for you

Eclipse
Smod Tactical
Riot act
Fakefactory (Older versions of course)

Not sure these will all run on ep1 source, but these and the ones I mentioned above are about the only ones I have ever played more than once

item.title: Good HL 2 mods

item.description:
Get ep2 now!

As for some good mods:

Garrys mod

That’s all off the top of my head.
